main event: A student observed a dark round object the size of a basketball with a bell-shaped exhaust tail on December 5, 1956.
interesting points: The object started to rise, accelerated, and disappeared after a 30-second deviation., The observation lasted approximately 1 minute., The sighting was reported to Westover AFB via telephone on December 7, 1956., The object was first seen at an altitude of 1500 feet and disappeared with an orange-yellow puff., Possible explanations for the sighting included jet aircraft exhaust or sunspots.
witness description: a 26-year-old student at the University of Massachusetts
